languages.text: "Ты правда готова пожертвовать пестрыми оттенками свой души, дабы избавиться от проклятия, что тебя тяготит?" {n}Кассия опускает взгляд и прикладывает ладонь к Атласу в своей груди.{/n} "Если... если это и правда возможно... если это то, чего ты хочешь..."

"Are you really willing to sacrifice the many colours of your soul to escape the curse that weighs so heavy on you?" {n}Cassia lowers her gaze and rests her hand against the Atlas in her chest.{/n} "If... it really is possible... and it is what you truly want..."
languages.original_text: "Ты правда готова пожертвовать пестрыми оттенками свой души, дабы избавиться от проклятия, что тебя тяготит?" {n}Кассия опускает взгляд и прикладывает ладонь к Атласу в своей груди.{/n} "Если... если это и правда возможно... если это то, чего ты хочешь..."

traits.locale_text: "Are you really willing to sacrifice the many colours of your soul to escape the curse that is weighing you down?" {n}Cassia lowers her gaze and rests her palm against the Atlas in her chest.{/n} "If... this really is possible... and is what you truly want..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Are you really willing to sacrifice the many colours of your soul to escape the curse that weighs so heavy on you?" {n}Cassia lowers her gaze and rests her hand against the Atlas in her chest.{/n} "If... it really is possible... and it is what you truly want..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「重くのしかかる呪いから逃れるために、魂のあらゆる色を犠牲にすることを本当にいとわないのでしょうか？」{n}カシアは視線を落とし、胸のアトラスに手のひらを当てる。{/n}「もし…これが本当に可能なら…そしてあなたが真に求めるものが…」
languages.original_text: "Are you really willing to sacrifice the many colours of your soul to escape the curse that weighs so heavy on you?" {n}Cassia lowers her gaze and rests her hand against the Atlas in her chest.{/n} "If... it really is possible... and it is what you truly want..."

traits.locale_text: 「重くのしかかる呪いから逃れるために、魂のあらゆる色を犠牲にすることを本当にいとわないのでしょうか？」{n}カシアは視線を落とし、胸のアトラスに手のひらを当てる。{/n}「もし…これが本当に可能なら…そしてあなたが真に求めるものが…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你真的打算牺牲里灵魂中的那些颜色，来逃避拖累你的诅咒吗？”{n}卡西娅垂下头，将手放在胸前的圣仪上。{/n}“如果……这真是你想要的结果……这确实不是没有可能……”
languages.original_text: "Are you really willing to sacrifice the many colours of your soul to escape the curse that weighs so heavy on you?" {n}Cassia lowers her gaze and rests her hand against the Atlas in her chest.{/n} "If... it really is possible... and it is what you truly want..."

traits.locale_text: “你真的打算牺牲里灵魂中的那些颜色，来逃避拖累你的诅咒吗？”{n}卡西娅垂下头，将手掌放在胸前的圣仪上。{/n}“如果……这真是你想要的结果……这确实不是没有可能……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿De verdad está dispuesta a sacrificar todos los colores de su alma para escapar a la maldición que la aqueja?». {n}Cassia baja la mirada y se lleva la su mano al Atlas de su pecho.{/n} «Si... realmente es posible... y es lo que quiere de verdad...».
languages.original_text: "Are you really willing to sacrifice the many colours of your soul to escape the curse that weighs so heavy on you?" {n}Cassia lowers her gaze and rests her hand against the Atlas in her chest.{/n} "If... it really is possible... and it is what you truly want..."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad está dispuesta a sacrificar todos los colores de su alma para escapar a la maldición que la hostiga?». {n}Cassia baja la mirada y lleva la palma de su mano al Atlas de su pecho.{/n} «Si... realmente es posible... y es lo que quiere de verdad...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Seid Ihr wirklich bereit, die vielen Farben Eurer Seele zu opfern, um dem Fluch zu entkommen, der so schwer auf Euch lastet?" {n}Cassia senkt den Blick und legt ihre Hand auf den Atlas in ihrer Brust.{/n} "Falls ... das wirklich möglich ist ... und Ihr es wirklich wollt ..."
languages.original_text: "Are you really willing to sacrifice the many colours of your soul to escape the curse that weighs so heavy on you?" {n}Cassia lowers her gaze and rests her hand against the Atlas in her chest.{/n} "If... it really is possible... and it is what you truly want..."

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr wirklich bereit, die vielen Farben Eurer Seele zu opfern, um dem Fluch zu entkommen, der Euch belastet?" {n}Cassia senkt den Blick und legt ihre Handfläche auf den Atlas in ihrer Brust.{/n} "Falls ... das wirklich möglich ist ... und Ihr es wirklich wollt ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Seriez-vous prête à sacrifier toutes les couleurs de votre âme pour échapper à la malédiction qui pèse sur vos épaules ? » {n}Cassia baisse le regard sur l'Atlas incrusté dans sa poitrine et y appose une main.{/n} « Si... c'est vraiment possible... et si c'est là ce que vous souhaitez... »
languages.original_text: "Are you really willing to sacrifice the many colours of your soul to escape the curse that weighs so heavy on you?" {n}Cassia lowers her gaze and rests her hand against the Atlas in her chest.{/n} "If... it really is possible... and it is what you truly want..."

traits.locale_text: « Seriez-vous prête à sacrifier toutes les couleurs de votre âme pour échapper à la malédiction qui pèse sur vos épaules ? » {n}Cassia baisse le regard sur l'Atlas incrusté dans sa poitrine et y appose une main.{/n} « Si... c'est vraiment possible... et si c'est là ce que vous souhaitez... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sana bu kadar yük olan o lanetten kurtulmak için ruhunun onca rengini gözden çıkardın mı gerçekten?" {n}Cassia, bakışlarını yere çevirip elini göğsündeki Atlas'ın üzerine götürüyor.{/n} "Eğer... Eğer bu gerçekten mümkünse... Bir de gerçekten istediğin buysa..."
languages.original_text: "Are you really willing to sacrifice the many colours of your soul to escape the curse that weighs so heavy on you?" {n}Cassia lowers her gaze and rests her hand against the Atlas in her chest.{/n} "If... it really is possible... and it is what you truly want..."

traits.locale_text: "Sana bu kadar yük olmuş o lanetten kurtulmak için ruhunun onca rengini gözden çıkardın mı gerçekten?" {n}Cassia bakışlarını yere çevirip elini göğsündeki Atlas'ın üzerine götürüyor.{/n} "Eğer... Eğer bu gerçekten mümkünse... Ve gerçekten istediğin buysa..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
